 Lewis 1954, vol. 1

 Lewis 1954, vol. 2)

(eds.), 2001, The Cambridge Translations of Medieval Philosophical

Nederman, Cary J. and Kate Langdon Forhan (eds.), 1993,

O’Donovan, Oliver and Joan Lockwood O’Donovan, 1999,
From Irenaeus to Grotius: A Sourcebook in Christian Political

before 1100.)

Parens, Joshua and Joseph C. Macfarland (eds.), 2011, Medieval
Political Philosophy: A Sourcebook, 2nd edition. Ithaca, NY:
Cornell University Press. (Selections from authors writing in the
